casebody.data:
BANK
v.
BEST & BEST. No. 494PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2005. Richard S. Daniels, Asheville, for Best and Best.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of December 2005 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Blue Ridge Savings Bank, Inc.) shall have up to and including the 12th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of December 2005."
